JOB DESCRIPTION:
•  Minimum experience of 2- 5 years with a good understanding of object- oriented programming  (OOP)  and computer science foundations.
•  Experience in .NET Framework 3.5 and 4.0,  with specific focus on Microsoft Windows Presentation Framework  (WPF) .
•  Understanding of XML,  SOAP,  and Microsoft Windows Communication Foundation  (WCF)  highly preferred.
•  Knowledge of HTML5,  MVC and JQuery will be given preference.
•  Knowledge of Mobile platforms:  Android,  IOS.
